Instruction: In a medium bowl, mix together cooked rice, eggs, soy sauce, sesame oil, ginger, garlic, and green onions. Stir in carrot and peas.
Remove the skillet from heat and stir in the cooked rice, black beans, and diced tomatoes. Mix until well combined.
Serve the rice topped with the black bean mixture.
Fill the warm tortillas with the bean mixture and rice.
